rooms.description: A welcoming open space aligned with the vastu principle for positive energy flow, serving as a transitional area to the inner courtyard.
An open, ventilated central courtyard that enhances natural light and ventilation. It provides communal outdoor living space for relaxation.
A multipurpose area with ample floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring abundant natural light. Designed to connect visually with the courtyard.
Efficient and compact kitchen space, positioned per vastu guidelines in the south-east direction for prosperity, featuring energy-efficient appliances.
Spacious bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and a dedicated balcony. Includes built-in storage and en-suite bathroom following Vastu norms.
Functional private bathroom designed to complement Bedroom 1, incorporating water elements in accordance with vastu principles.

openings.features: Floor-to-ceiling glass panels providing abundant natural light and cross ventilation.
Spacious balcony extending from the bedroom, offering outdoor space with privacy.
Large glass door opening into the living area for seamless indoor-outdoor connectivity.
Floor-to-ceiling glass doors that open to the courtyard, enhancing natural ventilation.

notes: Design respects local building norms and Vastu principles by strategically placing spaces. The layout ensures optimal sunlight exposure, natural ventilation, and privacy.
Budget-friendly solutions include efficient use of space, minimal but functional interior partitions, and use of cost-effective yet durable materials.
